document_data.name: Solonus Canathil
document_data.mainbody: '''Solonus Canathil''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Mielikki]] living in [[Elventree]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Malady of Elventree|6}}
document_data.Personality: The priest was careful and preferred conflicts to end peacefully.
document_data.Relationships: Canathil was a member of the [[Order of the Gauntlet]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Solonus asked for aid from his fellow members of Order of the Gauntlet to protect the [[summer solstice]] festival in Elventree.
